I liked the show very much until now. It was fresh and funny. I even survived the completely messed first episodes of the 3rd season (which already was the reason the show to be canceled once)... but now I couldn't force myself to force and watch this episode. It's pathetic. Now at least I will keep the good memories from the previous seasons.

PS. I decided to give a look at the 3rd episode. It starts slowly to get back to normal - it seems the screenplay writers suddenly got a flash and understood they are idiots. And yes - they are idiots. Cause from the end of season 2 they try very hard to repulse the viewers and now they achieved it. Just wonder why they did it?
